0e44c7ee-f1bc-4186-b10b-472eabdd7c92: The haemorrhage effect applied by Death Whisper deals an additional +10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
10224f6c-6cfe-4e5e-b314-94031e82921e:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} makes an attack with the current weapon against an enemy. This attack cannot miss and deals +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It also deals additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} , {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled for this attack.
The Assassin suffers +100% more damage until the end of combat.
119e3fe3-9c3a-49c0-9fd7-a23df8acb383: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy without hitting the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin gains +{uip|DodgeBonus|6835d43cba1d460f8b2ab0cb2bf31730}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
1333debf-5aa5-40e4-b3e0-6af71a482474: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy that is at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Assassin gains +20% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} against that enemy until the end of the Assassin's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
1af3f079-5e59-4be0-8457-d71af61b4ace: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} sees a single {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} for each enemy on one of the enemy's sides. Opening: whenever the Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}max wounds{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. After an attack, the opening is moved to the opposite side of the enemy. Openings of each enemy that were not hit by the Assassin during the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} are moved to a random side of that enemy at the start of the Assassin's next turn.
208b22a8-d0c5-4c63-8ae5-f5682f53cd4a: Poised to Strike also reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −{uip|DodgeReduction|7a62adafb0dd4af4895608cfee6dc971}%.
2338813b-e4d1-4d7b-9a5b-766e09c93c58:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassins{/g} are masters at identifying the slightest vulnerabilities of {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} and dispatching them by any means necessary.
Core focus: high {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, threat elimination, hit-and-run.
31d037d3-e46b-4772-94b4-005a411e0047:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s next single-target attack will have a −50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, with a minimum of 0% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} penetration, and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}.
- If it's a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, its target rotates 180 degrees. The enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} against the Assassin's attack is equal to 0% until the start of this enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
- If it's a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack, its target is forced to move to the closest cell in a 3-cell range with no adjacent {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} facing toward the Assassin. This movement provokes {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
38c5c0bd-bd06-4a63-bf20-97e8128a66fb: If the Dispatch attack kills the target, all enemies in a 3-cell radius around the target gain +2 stacks of the {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g} effect and must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Disturbed: a disturbed character suffers a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} for each stack of this effect. To remove the disturbed effect, a character must {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g} aboard the voidship for at least 24 standard hours. Staggered: a staggered character suffers a −20 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, and Agility.
422582b0-edae-4c0c-8d97-6a2a1c8bdffd: For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} becomes the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for enemy attacks and gains Elusive: -the Assassin can move through enemies -the Assassin gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +{unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} -the Assassin's attacks deal +10% additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} -all {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}half cover{/g} provides the Assassin 50% cover efficiency. Elusive fades when the Assassin attacks.
463822e0-4458-44eb-9e44-be750b70dce6: If an enemy suffers a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} from one of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s allies, at the start of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, a new {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} is created on that enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin.
4e4bdcf8-aef6-4a65-b003-8040f569892c: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy with a single-target attack, this attack reduces the target's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} by −10% until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack.
6b5b1222-3c80-47ba-81bc-e06e42acbe69: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals 5 or more {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy with a single attack, the Assassin gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks.
6dc888e4-36a3-4772-986a-e3b2020c7a0a: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} +{uip|Lethality|daa322267afb45a9852f295a758c75c0}% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} for the next successful attack.
7c315018-eb9b-4474-a781-f6dc5ea51205:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} makes an enemy suffer −{uip|ArmourReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and −{uip|DeflectionReduction|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af} {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} until the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
- If there is only 1 enemy adjacent to them, the Assassin also gains +{uip|DodgePenetrationBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until the Assassin's next turn.
- If there are no enemies adjacent to the Assassin, they gain +{uip|DodgeBonus|d8dd5aa174fb49a4b493ba266dece9af}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} until their next turn.
81679d7d-a44a-423a-8815-14d26e145190: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all enemies that do not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} suffer the unsuspecting effect until the end of the Assassin's turn. Unsuspecting: the Assassin gains +7% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} and +7% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} against unsuspecting enemies.
857c8b76-17b5-49ff-b599-47ecbd28018a: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} gains +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} against enemies that have any of following effects: {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, or haemorrhage. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is gained for each of these effects but cannot exceed +45 lethality.
8708c494-2a92-4e66-9d76-19146062f4ee:
This value shows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s current base {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} before being modified by enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}.
The Assassin's base lethality is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
88dfe4c0-733c-400a-a53c-2aa55530e5a5: The {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} of Feinting Attack is reduced to −20%.
8eeb10cb-97c7-4775-953e-65d20fe0c68b: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} has no more than 1 adjacent enemy, any enemy that moves into a cell adjacent to the Assassin must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|39a30ee0e035405ea0823dd98dafea7c} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, if possible, and become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of that enemy's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
911d07bb-e763-484f-9755-32292c625c06: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is increased by +{uip|DamageBonus|abb1af6ec9944442b4d815aadfa61db8}% until the end of combat. Stacks.
92738713-9daa-41cc-8cfc-473226238697: Until the end of combat, the target of Dispatch loses half of its current {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
93c9a7bf-9ffe-435e-806e-3df5f443e232:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} makes an attack with the current weapon against an enemy. This attack cannot miss and deals +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. It also deals additional damage equal to 25% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g} are doubled for this attack.
9e1192fc-1ed7-41ee-8fd6-5e7a9cc4a935: The enemy last {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damaged{/g} by the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Witness}witness{/g} effect. Witness: if a witness does not have the Assassin in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, that witness suffers {uip|WeaponDamagePercent|7bec62f15dc440748fb6d510e9b13f85}% of the maximum base damage of the Assassin's current weapon.
a0f04f2c-e1fe-4733-b3f2-8f0585857c5a: Every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the first use of an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} costs 0 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
a24a3eb4-9aab-46e4-a761-54950a602663: For every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g}'s attack, that attack also deals +1 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the same target. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.
ac401b7d-0f20-427c-ac20-e26f5072bf3c: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} chooses an enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} and marks an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g} on this enemy on whichever side is closest to the Assassin. If this additional opening isn't {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the end of the Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, it disappears.
b1992750-8de6-4031-bab3-88bfbf3473ab: Each use of Aim for the {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}Opening{/g} on the same target reduces that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} by −10%. Stacks.
beb3c2d9-f8ef-49f6-8cc3-5b51bb805fdc: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks an enemy, the Assassin gains +<u>((Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}) − (target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g})) / 2</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g}. This lethality {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cannot be less than 0.
bedd622b-21d6-417a-90c3-95c378fdd7b1: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g}, the target must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|ResistancePenalty|fadb11b4b0e548ce889983f77d3a7fff} {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g} until the end of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
c335a908-7ff8-4792-935b-908c25b7afc4: Dispatch deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} equal to 45% of the target's missing {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead of 25% of its missing wounds.
c6135398-7586-4480-9c38-9d442a7094da: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} deals {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of the {g|Encyclopedia:Vulnerable}vulnerable{/g} effect. Vulnerable: the character suffers +(number of vulnerable stacks) × {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus}% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the Assassin's attacks. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}.
c916732f-22f2-40ba-864d-db05f0012d72:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} dashes in a straight line for up to {uip|Range|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} cells, suffering −{uip|AOODamageReduction|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76} less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g} and gaining +{uip|DodgeBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the enemies they dash through until the next Assassin's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
If the Assassin hasn't dashed through any enemies, at the end of their turn they gain +{uip|CoverBonus|af4b536f77d14e12907337ff0efb7f76}% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} to their cover until the Assassin moves.
Doesn't stack with itself.
After the first use, the Assassin can use this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} again for free.
c9b033bd-9d12-4d49-ac05-0fa4b1432cae: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} makes an attack that does not count toward the limit of {g|Encyclopedia:AttacksPerTurn}attacks per turn{/g} and does not block the Assassin's movement, but deals only 25% of base {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If successful, the target of that attack suffers from haemorrhage: At the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} they will suffer {uip|Lethality|33214b7215b442519f4303bcd4a8ab34} {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
ce1c7430-23d2-431f-a82e-22843d0f8141: While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} has no allies in a 5-cell radius around them, they gain +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}.
daf57599-5950-49b4-9100-39878a6334c0: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} attacks and grants +40% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} to the target for this attack. If this attack {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}, it deals an additional +{uip|Damage|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. If this attack hits an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, its additional damage is increased by {uip|DamageBonus|c9dba0331212410dabe7dd2e19c52cd3}%. {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}Lethality{/g}: a specific Assassin parameter that is equal to dodge or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
db4779fb-ff3f-43da-af8f-3d8902255270: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} gains +{g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}<u>Lethality</u>{/g}% chance to deal +<u>5% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}max wounds{/g}</u> more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}.
e8703c29-daa3-4893-8cac-368ed5c6f90b: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} is elusive at the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they gain +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} until the end of their turn.
eced03a4-1c93-46d5-b67f-aaac7d4a92b4: Deals ({g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} / 10) {g|Encyclopedia:RendingDamage}rending damage{/g} that ignores {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} at the beginning of each of the target's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Lethality: a specific {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} parameter that is equal to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g}, whichever is higher.
f4bdc1ad-414c-42dd-adb4-82193178a925: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Opening}opening{/g}, they gain +{uip|Lethality|fbe8ea3f3a2e4ce2b7ea337bda40bbd2} (rounded down) {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
f88af8ef-5cc4-4fd7-90fe-8a632f1e18e4: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a target with an attack that has 100 {g|Encyclopedia:Lethality}lethality{/g} or greater for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Assassin immediately regains the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} spent for that attack.
